name: Runaway Games Website
description:
Hi,


Greetings of the day!


I particularly like to create and maintain user-centered designs based on business requirements which aligns me with my work values and goals. I can help you achieve the desired style guides, design systems, design patterns, and attractive user interfaces for your clients or business. I have the prior experience and expertise required to create designs that will definitely help build a brand identity for your clients or business.


About Me:

I specialize in UI/UX of B2B, B2C, SaaS, eCommerce, Web & Mobile App Design & Graphic Design, with significant experience working on various projects for more than years. I always try to focus on the user and on the key business indicators (and KPI) as well, which allows me to make a really useful design for the users and the business.


Expertise:

- Complex Web App and Mobile App Designs

- Mockup, Wireframes, Responsive Website Designs

- User Interface Design: Websites, Landing Pages, Logo, Blogs, Mobile Websites, Mobile Apps, Desktop software.

- HTML5, CSS3, SaaS, Bootstrap, Bootstrap v5.0

- Figma, Invision, AdobeXd, Adobe Photoshop, Sketch, Illustrator, Coral Draw, etc.
